s.text: The Wall Street Journal reports that child labor is flourishing in the U.S., because when the economy is strong, employers can't find enough adult cheap labor.
It is estimated, says the paper, that there are more than 300,000 underage children working illegally in the U.S., more than half on commercial farms.
The three anti-abortion organizers found in effect to be racketeers are active in Operation Rescue and/or the Pro-Life Action League.
